    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(int message_id,
               int receiver_id,
               int sender_id,
               java.lang.String title,
               java.lang.String text,
               java.time.LocalDateTime date,
               int read)
        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a message. The message holds all user data for receiver and sender.
        Parameters:
        message_id - Unique id of the message.
        receiver_id - Id of receiving user.
        sender_id - Id of sending user.
        title - Title of the message.
        text - Text of the message (message itself).
        date - Date when the message was sent.
        read - Whether the message was read already.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
